General.Name: Banco Mercantil do Brasil S.A
General.Description: Banco Mercantil do Brasil S.A. provides financial services to individuals and corporate clients in Brazil. The company offers personal credit; payroll credit card; checking account; overdraft; vehicle financing; and other products and services. It is also involved in overdraft; private pension; investment banking; real estate; insurance brokerage, and management of investment funds. The company operates a network of multiple branches, and service points. The company was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
General.Address: 654 Rio de Janeiro Street, Downtown, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil, 30160-912
